references: Related: CF 271021. Superseding: Ord 99575, Ord 100072, Ord 99490.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department, establishing a new position therein, providing payment therefor and superseding the 1971 Salary Ordinances (99575 as amended by 100072) and the 1971 Budget (Ordinance 99490) insofar as in conflict.
